name: ProPhase Labs, Inc.
description: ProPhase Labs, Inc. is a diversified healthcare and wellness company that focuses on developing and commercializing innovative products in the health and wellness sector. Founded in 1996, ProPhase is dedicated to enhancing the health and well-being of consumers through its proprietary product lines, including dietary supplements, over-the-counter (OTC) medications, and other health-related products. The company is best known for its flagship brand, Cold-EEZE, which is an effective zinc-based lozenge that helps reduce the duration and severity of cold symptoms. ProPhase Labs also emphasizes research and development to create new health solutions that address the needs of consumers in a rapidly evolving market. The company is committed to quality, utilizing advanced manufacturing techniques and adhering to stringent regulatory standards to ensure the safety and efficacy of its products. With a strong emphasis on customer satisfaction and product innovation, ProPhase Labs aims to become a leader in the health and wellness industry, providing consumers with effective solutions that promote a healthier lifestyle.

seo.meta_title: ProPhase Labs, Inc. | Health and Wellness Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore ProPhase Labs, Inc., a leader in health and wellness products. Discover our innovative solutions, including Cold-EEZE and dietary supplements.

faq.question: What products does ProPhase Labs offer?
faq.answer: ProPhase Labs offers dietary supplements, OTC medications, and wellness products, with Cold-EEZE being its flagship product.

faq.question: Where is ProPhase Labs headquartered?
faq.answer: ProPhase Labs is headquartered in Doylestown, Pennsylvania, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of ProPhase Labs?
faq.answer: Terry D. Dyer is the CEO of ProPhase Labs, Inc.
